data.title: AV Software Engineer
data.tasks: Preparing meeting rooms, configuring AV hardware, designing AV systems with QSYS, and designing  User Interface for QSYS projects. I always strived to optimize processes and improve existing installations, utilizing Lua scripting for software engineer and handling support work efficiently.

data.title: Creative System Designer
data.tasks: As a Creative System Designer, I developed and implemented interactive and technical solutions for the Soundlab project at the Stedelijk Museum in Amsterdam. My role focused on designing and prototyping embedded systems using Arduino, crafting user-centered technical designs, and ensuring seamless integration of hardware and software. This work blended creativity and technical expertise to enhance the visitor experience through innovative sound installations.
